definition: Morsi, Mursi or Morsy (name)/Mohamed Morsi (1951-), Egyptian Muslim Brotherhood politician, president of Egypt 2012-2013
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Moreover it has been awarded with the official seal for organic products from the Murcia region.
sentences.chinese: 此外，產品獲得穆爾西亞產區有機產品的官方標籤。

sentences.english: It is bordered by the Med as well as Valencia and the Murcia region.
sentences.chinese: 這是瀕臨地中海，以及瓦倫西亞和穆爾西亞地區。

sentences.english: Rescinding those powers was a major demand of Morsi's opponents.
sentences.chinese: 廢除那些權力是反穆爾西派的主要要求。

sentences.english: He cut short his European visit because of continuing protests in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 由於埃及抗議不斷，穆爾西只得縮短這次歐洲之行。

sentences.english: They have revolted anew because Morsi and the Brotherhood betrayed the revolution.
sentences.chinese: 他們重新反叛是因爲穆爾西和穆兄會背叛了革命。
